definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Some hot pot restaurants use paraffin instead of butter.
sentences.chinese: 有些火鍋店用石蠟替代牛油。

sentences.english: There's a difference in interpretation about what a short-chain chlorinated paraffin is.
sentences.chinese: 亨利說，“對短鏈氯化石蠟的定義有不同的解釋。”

sentences.english: The fertilization of Tamarix chinensis was observed by means of conventional paraffin sectioning.
sentences.chinese: 利用常規石蠟製片技術，觀察了檉柳的受精作用。

sentences.english: The development characters of small- nutted longan embryo were studied by paraffin method.
sentences.chinese: 採用石蠟切片法研究小核龍眼胚胎髮育的特點。

sentences.english: All specimen were fixed by formalin and embedded by paraffin .
sentences.chinese: 所有標本經福爾馬林固定，石蠟包埋。

sentences.english: This paper gives some details about the development of embryo in Lygodium japonicum(Thunb.
sentences.chinese: 利用石蠟切片法研究了海金沙胚胎髮育過程。

sentences.english: The reason for the disagreement may be due to difficulty in defining exactly what a short-chain chlorinated paraffin is.
sentences.chinese: 這兩種講法的分歧可能在於如何定義短鏈氯化石蠟。

sentences.english: At present, China has been the exploitation of crude oil to low sulfur paraffinic most.
sentences.chinese: 目前我國已開採的原油以低硫石蠟基居多。

sentences.english: A new process for catalytic chlorination of paraffin is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述石蠟催化氯化的新技術。

sentences.english: Methods Using the routine method of paraffin wax embed, the morphologic variation were observed by microscope.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用常規石蠟包埋法，在光鏡下進行形態學觀察。

sentences.english: A new turbidimetry for the determination of chlorine content in chlorinate paraffin has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 建立了比濁法測定氯化石蠟中氯的新方法。

sentences.english: Bigger says the exhaust has a light waxy smell, like paraffin.
sentences.chinese: 比格爾說，排放的廢氣有一種輕微的石蠟氣味。

sentences.english: Finally, the various production methods of halogenated paraffins were briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 最後對鹵化石蠟的生產方法進行了簡要介紹。

sentences.english: The same colorant will give different color tones with palm and paraffin waxes.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的着色劑對棕櫚蠟和石蠟會產生不同的顏色效果。

sentences.english: Routinely processed 4% formamint-fixed, paraffin-embedded blocks were archived.
sentences.chinese: 所有標本用4%多聚甲醛固定，常規石蠟包埋後存檔。

sentences.english: During the day, a container of wax absorbs solar energy as it melts.
sentences.chinese: 白天的時候，在圓錐中的石蠟吸收陽光而融化。
